import React from 'react' import './NewsCard.css' const NewsCard = ({ newsItem }) => { console.log(newsItem); const fulldate = new Date(newsItem.publishedAt); var date = fulldate. return (
{newsItem.title} short by {newsItem.author ? newsItem.author : "unknown"}
{newsItem.description} read more at{" "} {newsItem.source.name}
) } export default NewsCard
